New Records: Yuzvendra Chahal equalled Bhuvneshwar Kumar's feat of most T20I wickets for India with a total of 90 scalps
Key Match Events: Wicket for India, Feat for Chahal!
Rahul Tripathi goes back to hut
India lose first wicket as Ishan Kishan departs.
Suryakumar Yadav smashes 51 (26) in style with a boundary
Suryakumar Yadav and Shubman Gill take charge
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya: We'll bat first. Looks like a good track, the last time we played here, the ball did a bit, we might get more swing in the night.
Dasun Shanaka: We would have batted first as well. We wanted to set the tone upfront.
